app.name: Lexikongo — Kikongo Dictionary
home.title: Lexikongo — Kikongo Dictionary
home.description: Online Kikongo dictionary: words, verbs, expressions, with translations in French and English, pronunciation and phonetics.
home.keywords: lexikongo, kikongo dictionary, kikongo french, kikongo english, kikongo lexicon, kikongo phonetics
verbs.index.title: Kikongo verbs
verbs.index.description: List of Kikongo verbs with their translation in French and English and their phonetic transcription.
verbs.index.keywords: kikongo verbs, kikongo conjugation, verb dictionary
verbs.detail.title: Kikongo verb: {verb}
verbs.detail.description: Definition, examples and translations of the Kikongo verb “{verb}” in French and English.
verbs.detail.keywords: kikongo verb {verb}, kikongo dictionary, kikongo conjugation
words.index.title: Kikongo words
words.index.description: Kikongo lexicon: words, meanings, translations in French and English, and phonetics.
words.index.keywords: kikongo words, kikongo vocabulary, kikongo lexicon
words.detail.title: Kikongo word: {word}
words.detail.description: Definition and translations of the Kikongo word “{word}” in French and English.
words.detail.keywords: kikongo word {word}, kikongo dictionary, kikongo vocabulary
expressions.index.title: Kikongo expressions
expressions.index.description: Idiomatic expressions and useful phrases in Kikongo with translations in French and English.
expressions.index.keywords: kikongo expressions, kikongo phrases, kikongo conversation
login.title: Login
login.description: Log in to manage your profile and contribute to the dictionary.
register.title: Sign up
register.description: Create an account to contribute to the Lexikongo dictionary.
profile.title: My profile
profile.description: View and update your Lexikongo account information.

hero.subtitle: Kikongo · French · English dictionary with phonetics. A living resource to learn, explore and contribute to the Kikongo linguistic heritage.

contribute.title: Contribute to the lexicon
contribute.body: Add new words, verbs or expressions and help the community enrich the database.

login.title: Log in
login.body: Access your dashboard, your submissions and your activity.

seo.title: Lexikongo — Kikongo · French · English Dictionary
seo.description: Lexikongo is an online Kikongo · French · English dictionary with phonetics. Explore Kikongo words, verbs and expressions and help preserve the language.
seo.ogDescription: A modern resource to discover, practice and transmit the Kikongo language: words, verbs, expressions and phonetics.

words.list.title: Word list
words.list.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words with their plural form, phonetics, and translations in French and English.
words.list.count: {n} word in the database | {n} words in the database
words.list.searchPlaceholder: Word, plural, FR or EN translation…
words.list.empty: No words found at the moment.
words.list.caption: Each row shows a Kikongo word in singular and plural form, its phonetic transcription, and its translations in French and English.
verbs.list.title: Verb list
verbs.list.subtitle.prefix: Browse Kikongo verbs with the particle
verbs.list.subtitle.suffix: of the infinitive, their phonetics, and their translations into French and English.
verbs.list.count: {n} verb in the database | {n} verbs in the database
verbs.list.empty: No verbs found at the moment.
verbs.list.caption: Each row shows a Kikongo verb in the infinitive (with ku), its phonetic transcription, and its translations into French and English.
verbs.list.rowAria: View details for the verb ku {verb}
expressions.list.title: All expressions
expressions.list.subtitle: Browse at a glance the words and verbs in Kikongo, with their phonetics and translations into French and English.
expressions.list.searchPlaceholder: Word, verb, FR or EN translation…
expressions.list.empty: No expressions found for these filters.
expressions.list.caption: Each row represents either a word or a verb in Kikongo, with its phonetic transcription and its translations into French and English.
expressions.list.rowAriaVerb: View details for the verb ku {verb}

expressions.cards.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words and verbs at a glance, with their phonetics and their translations into French and English.

page.title: Verb list
page.subtitle: Browse Kikongo verbs with their phonetic transcription and translations into French and English. Perfect for learning, revision and teaching material.
page.ctaTitle: Can’t find the verb you are looking for?
page.ctaText: Help enrich the lexicon by contributing new Kikongo verbs with their translations and usage examples. Every contribution helps the community learn and pass on the language.

meta.title: Kikongo verb list – Lexikongo
meta.description: Explore Kikongo verbs with their phonetics and translations into French and English. A useful tool for learning and teaching the language.

page.title: Kikongo words and verbs list
page.subtitle: Browse Kikongo words and verbs from the Lexikongo database, with their phonetic transcription and translations into French and English.
page.listSubtitle: An overview of all Kikongo word and verb entries currently available in the Lexikongo dictionary.
page.bottomCtaTitle: Can’t find the expression you’re looking for?
page.bottomCtaText: Help enrich the lexicon by adding new Kikongo words or verbs with their translations and usage examples.

meta.title: Kikongo words and verbs list – Lexikongo
meta.description: Discover the full list of Kikongo words and verbs with their phonetics and translations into French and English.
